snippet: Malala Yousafzai, the schoolgirl who survived a Taliban assassination attempt last October, received a human rights award on Friday.
abstract: Malala Yousafzai, Pakistani schoolgirl who survived Taliban assassination attempt, receives Anna Politkovskaya Award, given annually by the group RAW in WAR (Reach All Women in War) to a woman who defends human rights.
lead_paragraph: Malala Yousafzai, the schoolgirl who survived a Taliban assassination attempt last October, received a human rights award on Friday.

headline.main: Pakistan: Girl Shot by Taliban Wins a Rights Award
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Girl Shot by Taliban Wins a Rights Award

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
